Nothing special or unique.

So gorgeous
Bvlgari Goldea EDP 1.5ml/0.05oz Mini Spray Sample
BVLGARI
{'Brand': 'BVLGARI', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Item Volume': '1.5 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 5 x 1 inches; 12 Ounces', 'UPC': '783320506017'}

First spray it smells great
Immortal Twilight Perfume for Women - The Official Fragrance of The Twilight Saga, Floral and Feminine Scent - Everlasting and Never to Be Forgotten - 1.7 oz 50 ml
Tru Fragrance Beauty
{'Brand': 'Tru Fragrance Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.1 x 3.5 x 3.1 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '087327002573'}
This scent is different. Unique.! That's why I like it. Doesn't smell like all the others. Original.thats good. I can smell the freesia and chamomile. It's good.
Lasts a long time on clothes
CARRIE - Color: BUTTER PECAN-R
Noriko
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy curl straight normal fine textured hair, Wavy, Textured', 'Brand': 'Noriko', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Item model number': 'ssNOR-Carrie-BUTTERPECANR', 'UPC': '694483010009'}
Fits small, the wig cap. But it will stretch out with time. Good wig. The side layers flop around a bit and annoy a little but it's a very pretty style and is very well made. It's worth the price, yes. !
Great color.!!
Agent Provocateur Fatale Pink Eau De Parfum for women 1.7 oz
Agent Provocateur
{'Brand': 'Agent Provocateur', 'Item Volume': '200 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Fragrance Concentration': 'Eau_de_parfum', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0085715731517', 'UPC': '085715731517', 'Manufacturer': 'Agent Provocateur'}
Way too light for me. Has no power. No strength to this. Not worth buying unless you like weak perfume.
Too weak. Too watery.
AVERY - Color: MAPLE SUGAR-R
Noriko
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, wavy curl straight normal fine textured hair, textured', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Noriko', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'UPC': '694483011051'}
I can't even tell u how gorgeous this wig is. Really..... ! Even better than their Brittany wig and that one is great. Avery is so gorgeous. !
One of the best wigs I have.!!
Femme by Usher Perfume for Women Eau De Parfum 1.7 oz
Usher
["What You GetFemme by Usher Eau de ParfumFragrance NotesTop: Bergamot, pink berries and pearMid: Jasmine petals, white rose and irisBase: Patchouli, cedarwood and warm muskWhat It DoesInspired by Usher's sophistication and timelessnessBlend of bright bergamot and pink berries wrapped in soft white floralsWarm woods for a sensual essenceSensual with a modern, sophisticated femininityMade in USA"]

It's not sweet. It's a lite Woody slightly floral smell. His first and second perfumes are better. I had em all.
Not as good as his other two perfumes

Barely a scent at all !!!!

Todays perfumes are too watery and weak, and this one is the same thing. Smells good for about 45 minutes to an hour. Then, gone. Waste of money basically.
Not strong enuff. Too weak.
